titles.title: A resolution to replace the membership of the Select Committee on Ethics with former Members selected by the Majority Leader and the Minority Leader.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2967)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 3/16/1993--Introduced. Amends Senate Resolution 338, 88th Congress, to replace the membership of the Select Committee on Ethics with former Members of the Senate selected by the Majority and Minority Leaders.
